silmarel.likelihood.lenstronomy_likeli module¶

Module to run lenstronomy-based fast multi-messenger inference.

class silmarel.likelihood.lenstronomy_likeli.LenstronomyMCMC(em_data: Any, gw_data: Any, em_prior: dict, gw_prior: dict, models: dict, z_l: float, z_s: float | None, H0: float = 70, outdir: str = 'outdir_silmarel')¶

Bases: object

Lenstronomy-based fast lens reconstruction.

Attributes:¶

em_prior: dict

Dictionary of EM lens parameter priors.

gw_prior: dict

Dictionary of GW parameter priors.

em_data: Any

Data object for lens reconstruction.

gw_data: Any

GWData() object for GW localisation.

models: dict

List of EM lens/source models.

z_l: float

Lens redshift.

z_s: float / None

Source redshift, if not sampled.

H0: float

Hubble constant.

outdir: str

Path to outdir.

Methods:¶

run_lens_reconstruction plot_reconstruction run_gw_localisation

log_likelihood(theta)¶
log_prior(theta)¶
log_prob(theta)¶
plot_reconstruction()¶

Plot lens reconstruction results.

run_gw_localisation(sampler: str = 'emcee', n_iter: int = 1000)¶

Function to run GW localisation/reconstruction.

Parameters:

  • sampler (str) – Selected sampler. Options: emcee

  • n_iter (int) – Number of iteractions/steps.

run_lens_reconstruction(fit_seq: list)¶

Runs the lens reconstruction using the defined settings.

Parameters:

fit_seq (list) – lenstronomy-appropriate list with selected samplers & sampler settings.
